quest.name: One Man's Relic
journal: Annes seeks relics of a particular sort, and she suspects you may know where to find them.
objectives: Deliver the enigmatic Bozjan relic to Annes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must have amassed  mettle.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have currently amassed  mettle.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: Blade Surname! A pleasure to make your acquaintance. My name is Annes.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: Zlatan has told me much of your difficulties working with Gerolt. N-Not to say that he is difficult to work with, mind. Ahem. He has also told me all about your exploits on the southern front.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: And that is precisely why I am here. I believe my research on tools and weapons from ancient Bozja may be of assistance to you.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: The recently discovered ruins of the Bozjan palace are no doubt rife with such relics. If you should happen to explore its depths, I would be most grateful if you could bring back anything you find.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: Safe travels, Blade Surname. I look forward to your return.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This quest can be completed once per week, with completion status being reset every [Reset]SundayMondayTuesdayWednesdayThursdayFridaySaturday at 12345678910111212 p.m.a.m. (Earth time).

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The item Annes seeks can be obtained by completing the raid “Delubrum Reginae.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To enter Delubrum Reginae, speak with Sjeros in Gangos.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: It is good to see you, Blade Surname. The relics you retrieved from the ruins have been of great help in my research.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: Since you seem to have quite a talent for unearthing ancient artifacts, perhaps you could widen the net─so to speak─to include tools used in Bozjan rituals. They would certainly be a boon to our work.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: Naturally, some relics are more useful than others, so any that we do not require for our work are yours to keep.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: I would be most grateful for any relics you can find that may have been used in ancient rituals. But do be careful down there. There may be all manner of traps set to protect the place.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: You are returned! And in one piece, I see. Were you able to recover anything of note from the ruins?

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: Extraordinary. Simply extraordinary. My, and what is this...?

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: There seems to be some sort of ancient coinage mixed in with the accoutrements you've brought. While collectors may be fascinated by this ancient currency, it falls beyond our field of study, so you are welcome to keep it.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: In any case, you have given us more than enough to work with for the time being. Thank you, Blade Surname.

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: You have a fine eye for antiquities, Blade Surname. My, and what is this...?

dialogue.name: ANNES
dialogue.text: More coinage! As agreed, you may do with it as you will. Thank you again for all your help.
